java/liquibase/database/MySQLDatabase.java

00001 package liquibase.database;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.sql.RawSqlStatement;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00005 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00006 
00007 import java.sql.Connection;
00008 
00012 public class MySQLDatabase extends AbstractDatabase {
00013     public static final String PRODUCT_NAME = "MySQL";
00014 
00015     public String getProductName() {
00016         return "MySQL";
00017     }
00018 
00019     public String getTypeName() {
00020         return "mysql";
00021     }
00022 
00023 
00024     public String getConnectionUsername() throws JDBCException {
00025         return super.getConnectionUsername().replaceAll("\\@.*", "");
00026     }
00027 
00028     public boolean isCorrectDatabaseImplementation(Connection conn) throws JDBCException {
00029         return PRODUCT_NAME.equalsIgnoreCase(getDatabaseProductName(conn));
00030     }
00031 
00032     public String getDefaultDriver(String url) {
00033         if (url.startsWith("jdbc:mysql")) {
00034             return "com.mysql.jdbc.Driver";
00035         }
00036         return null;
00037     }
00038 
00039 
00040     public String getBooleanType() {
00041         return "TINYINT(1)";
00042     }
00043 
00044     public String getCurrencyType() {
00045         return "DECIMAL";
00046     }
00047 
00048     public String getUUIDType() {
00049         return "CHAR(36)";
00050     }
00051 
00052     public String getClobType() {
00053         return "TEXT";
00054     }
00055 
00056     public String getBlobType() {
00057         return "BLOB";
00058     }
00059 
00060     public String getDateTimeType() {
00061         return "DATETIME";
00062     }
00063 
00064     public boolean supportsSequences() {
00065         return false;
00066     }
00067 
00068     public boolean supportsInitiallyDeferrableColumns() {
00069         return false;
00070     }
00071 
00072     public String getCurrentDateTimeFunction() {
00073         return "NOW()";
00074     }
00075 
00076     public String getLineComment() {
00077         return "--";
00078     }
00079 
00080     public String getFalseBooleanValue() {
00081         return "0";
00082     }
00083 
00084     public String getTrueBooleanValue() {
00085         return "1";
00086     }
00087 
00088     public String getConcatSql(String ... values) {
00089         StringBuffer returnString = new StringBuffer();
00090         returnString.append("CONCAT_WS(");
00091         for (String value : values) {
00092             returnString.append(value).append(", ");
00093         }
00094 
00095         return returnString.toString().replaceFirst(", $", ")");
00096     }
00097 
00098     public boolean supportsTablespaces() {
00099         return false;
00100     }
00101 
00102 
00103     protected String getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName() throws JDBCException {
00104         return super.getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName().replaceFirst("\\@.*","");
00105     }
00106 
00107     public String convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00108         if (requestedSchema == null) {
00109             return getDefaultDatabaseSchemaName();
00110         }
00111         return requestedSchema;
00112     }
00113 
00114     public String convertRequestedSchemaToCatalog(String requestedSchema) throws JDBCException {
00115         return requestedSchema;
00116     }
00117 
00118     public SqlStatement getViewDefinitionSql(String schemaName, String viewName) throws JDBCException {
00119         return new RawSqlStatement("select view_definition from information_schema.views where upper(table_name)='" + viewName.toUpperCase() + "'  and table_schema='" + convertRequestedSchemaToSchema(schemaName) + "'");
00120     }
00121 }
